author: CNET

author: CNET
description: Amazon has been testing their smart glasses technology with delivery drivers to make it safer for employees to make their routes and easier to handle packages. #smartglasses #amazon #ai #amazondelivery #deliveringthefuture
title: Amazon Debuts AI Smartglasses For Delivery Drivers

author: CNET
description:
Android says that when you switch from iPhone to Android, your favorite apps, photos and chats can come too... but do they really? How easy is it to migrate your digital life from Apple to Android? CNET video producer Carly Marsh swapped her iPhone 12 Mini for a Motorola Razr 2025 to find out.

Producer's Note: I reached out to Motorola about the issue I was having with transferring my iPhone messages to the Razr. Their advice was to factory reset the Razr and try the transfer again. When I did this, on the third try seen in this video, it yielded the same results. Motorola also said an update is coming to their Recorder app on the Play Store, and that a future version will support iOS Voice Memos.

00:00 Today I switch from Apple to Android
00:17 Android's promises
00:34 Why having an iPhone is kind of culty
00:54 Why I'm ditching my iPhone for an Android Razr phone
01:20 Telling my family I'm getting rid of my iPhone
01:28 A warning from an iPhone user married to an Android user
02:
title: Switching From iPhone to Android - Was It Worth It? | Prove It

author: CNET
description:
I’m not ashamed to say it: I love this Prius. The 2026 Toyota Prius Plug-In Nightshade Edition trades its awkward eco-car vibes for slick style, blacked-out details and surprising performance. Best of all, it’s still one of the most efficient HEVs on the road today.

title: Samsung Galaxy XR Hands-On: Gemini on Your Face for Half the Price of the Vision Pro

author: CNET
description: A new XR headset has officially entered the chat, and at a price that may surprise you. Google, Qualcomm and Samsung are working together to incorporate AI into AR/VR via Android XR, eventually building a line of smart glasses. That whole project begins with this Galaxy XR headset, now available for $1,799. It aims to extend Android and Gemini into new forms and feels as much like a stepping stone as an actual product. Here’s what CNET Editor at Large, Scott Stein, has to say about the headset after his demo. Which headset are you most interested in? 🥽 #galaxyxr #samsung #mixedreality #tech #vrheadset
title: Trying Samsung’s $1,800 Galaxy XR Headset 🥽
